column5: Hey Folks,  I've never been to BOQ... EVER!! I will be joining my friend heading up to his Cottage. Just wondering what I can expect to catch up there at this time of year? Whats biting? What tackle should I take? Lures? Any information would be much appreciated...  If it helps, specifically we'll be in the PICTON area.  Thanks in Advance, Rob (A2F)
walleye walleye walleye  you can jig for them or troll for them with deep diving lures like reef runners  night fishing near the weed beds can be great too
find some weedbeds and crank a taildancer on the edge of the weeds and you will hook up with walleye.
crank's, jig's, worm harnes and anything else you want to try.  ask your buddy what he catches most by him!?!?!  there is pike too and sheepheads and............
Rob have a blast BOQ is always on fire
and when it isn't we all like to go fishing....
Thanks Peeps!! I'm leaving here in a couple of hours - Hopefully I'll have a nice report upon my return!  Thanks Again!!
